segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is while the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just polishing that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, but she’s too distracted to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it’s making me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is waiting for a cookie, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a comedy of errors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever realize what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn’t tip over and hurt the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR
